mapper.select: select book_id, book_name, book_price from book where book_id = #{book_id}
mapper.insert: insert into orders (orderName, post, addr1, addr2, phone1, phone2, phone3, email1, email2, orderDate, member_id, book_id, quantity, totalPrice) values (#{orderName}, #{post}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3}, #{email1}, #{email2}, #{orderDate}, #{member_id}, #{book_id}, #{quantity}, #{totalPrice})
